### ts_area_1var { #scahpy.plots.timeseries.ts_area_1var }

```python
plots.timeseries.ts_area_1var(
    da,
    *,
    lat_range=None,
    lon_range=None,
    time=None,
    month=None,
    resample=None,
    label='Series',
    color='#1b9e77',
    linestyle='-',
    linewidth=1.8,
    title=None,
    ylabel=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Plot a time series (or monthly climatological cycle) averaged over a lat–lon box.

#### Notes {.doc-section .doc-section-notes}

This function DOES NOT perform any temporal subsetting. It uses the full
series provided by the user. Any prior selection (e.g., time ranges,
month filtering, anomalies, climatologies) must be done upstream.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type           | Description                                                        | Default    |
|-------------|----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| da          | xr.DataArray   | Input data array with 'time' or 'month' coordinate.                | _required_ |
| lat_range   | tuple of float | Latitude/longitude bounds (min, max) for area averaging.           | `None`     |
| lon_range   | tuple of float | Latitude/longitude bounds (min, max) for area averaging.           | `None`     |
| resample    | str            | Resampling frequency (e.g., 'M', 'Y', 'Q'). Only if 'time' exists. | `None`     |
| label       | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |
| color       | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |
| linestyle   | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |
| linewidth   | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |
| title       | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |
| ylabel      | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |
| output_path | optional       | Plot styling and output controls.                                  | `'Series'` |

#### Deprecated Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-deprecated-parameters}

time, month
    Ignored. Kept for backward compatibility to avoid breaking old calls.

### ts_point_1var { #scahpy.plots.timeseries.ts_point_1var }

```python
plots.timeseries.ts_point_1var(
    da,
    *,
    lat,
    lon=None,
    time=None,
    month=None,
    resample=None,
    labels=None,
    colors=None,
    linestyles=None,
    linewidth=1.8,
    title=None,
    ylabel=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Plot one or multiple point series (time or monthly) from a DataArray.

#### Notes {.doc-section .doc-section-notes}

No temporal subsetting is performed here; the full input series is used.
To subset in time or compute climatologies/anomalies, do it upstream.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type                           | Description                                                                                  | Default    |
|-------------|--------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| da          | xr.DataArray                   | Input data array with 'time' or 'month' coordinate.                                          | _required_ |
| lat         | float \| list \| list\[tuple\] | - Single point: lat=float and lon=float - Multiple points: [(lat1, lon1), (lat2, lon2), ...] | _required_ |
| lon         | float \| list \| list\[tuple\] | - Single point: lat=float and lon=float - Multiple points: [(lat1, lon1), (lat2, lon2), ...] | _required_ |
| resample    | str                            | Resampling frequency (e.g., 'M', 'Y', 'Q'). Only if 'time' exists.                           | `None`     |
| labels      | list                           | Styling per point series. Defaults will be generated if not provided.                        | `None`     |
| colors      | list                           | Styling per point series. Defaults will be generated if not provided.                        | `None`     |
| linestyles  | list                           | Styling per point series. Defaults will be generated if not provided.                        | `None`     |
| linewidth   | optional                       | Plot styling and output controls.                                                            | `1.8`      |
| title       | optional                       | Plot styling and output controls.                                                            | `1.8`      |
| ylabel      | optional                       | Plot styling and output controls.                                                            | `1.8`      |
| output_path | optional                       | Plot styling and output controls.                                                            | `1.8`      |

#### Deprecated Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-deprecated-parameters}

time, month
    Ignored. Kept for backward compatibility to avoid breaking old calls.
